refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: GooCanvasTableModel is a model for a table container used to lay out other canvas items. It is used in a similar way to how the GtkTable widget is used to lay out GTK+ widgets.

Item models are added to the table using the normal methods, then goo_canvas_item_model_set_child_properties() is used to specify how each child item is to be positioned within the table (i.e. which row and column it is in, how much padding it should have and whether it should expand or shrink).

GooCanvasTableModel is a subclass of GooCanvasItemModelSimple and so inherits all of the style properties such as "stroke-color", "fill-color" and "line-width". Setting a style property on a GooCanvasTableModel will affect all children of the GooCanvasTableModel (unless the children override the property setting).

GooCanvasTableModel implements the GooCanvasItemModel interface, so you can use the GooCanvasItemModel functions such as goo_canvas_item_model_raise() and goo_canvas_item_rotate(), and the properties such as "visibility" and "pointer-events".
To create a GooCanvasTableModel use goo_canvas_table_model_new().
To get or set the properties of an existing GooCanvasTableModel, use g_object_get() and g_object_set().

refsect2.title: The "height" property
refsect2.para: The requested height of the table, or -1 to use the default height.

refsect2.title: The "homogeneous-columns" property
refsect2.para: If all columns are the same width.

refsect2.title: The "homogeneous-rows" property
refsect2.para: If all rows are the same height.

refsect2.title: The "width" property
refsect2.para: The requested width of the table, or -1 to use the default width.

refsect2.title: The "bottom-padding" child property
refsect2.para: Extra space to add below the item.

refsect2.title: The "column" child property
refsect2.para: The column to place the item in.

refsect2.title: The "columns" child property
refsect2.para: The number of columns that the item spans.

refsect2.title: The "left-padding" child property
refsect2.para: Extra space to add to the left of the item.

refsect2.title: The "right-padding" child property
refsect2.para: Extra space to add to the right of the item.

refsect2.title: The "row" child property
refsect2.para: The row to place the item in.

refsect2.title: The "rows" child property
refsect2.para: The number of rows that the item spans.

refsect2.title: The "top-padding" child property
refsect2.para: Extra space to add above the item.

refsect2.title: The "x-align" child property
refsect2.para: The horizontal position of the item within its allocated space. 0.0 is left-aligned, 1.0 is right-aligned.

refsect2.title: The "x-expand" child property
refsect2.para: If the item expands horizontally as the table expands.

refsect2.title: The "x-fill" child property
refsect2.para: If the item fills all horizontal allocated space.

refsect2.title: The "x-shrink" child property
refsect2.para: If the item can shrink smaller than its requested size horizontally.

refsect2.title: The "y-align" child property
refsect2.para: The vertical position of the item within its allocated space. 0.0 is top-aligned, 1.0 is bottom-aligned.

refsect2.title: The "y-expand" child property
refsect2.para: If the item expands vertically as the table expands.

refsect2.title: The "y-fill" child property
refsect2.para: If the item fills all vertical allocated space.

refsect2.title: The "y-shrink" child property
refsect2.para: If the item can shrink smaller than its requested size vertically.
